verses.text: \w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w ruled|strong="H8199"\w*, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* certain \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* wife \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w reside|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* Elimelech, \w his|strong="H1961"\w* wife’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w Mahlon|strong="H4248"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Chilion|strong="H3630"\w*. \w They|strong="H8033"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* Ephrathites \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* entered \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* settled \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*’s husband Elimelech \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w with|strong="H4191"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w Moabite|strong="H4125"\w* women \w as|strong="H8141"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* wives, \w one|strong="H5375"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Orpah|strong="H6204"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w*. \w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w after|strong="H8145"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w had|strong="H3427"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4125"\w* \w about|strong="H8033"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*,

\w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w Mahlon|strong="H4248"\w* \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w Chilion|strong="H3630"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H8147"\w* Naomi \w was|strong="H3206"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w without|strong="H4191"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H3206"\w* \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w without|strong="H4191"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* husband. Ruth’s Loyalty to Naomi

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* Naomi \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w attended|strong="H6485"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* providing \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughters-in-law|strong="H3618"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w leave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

\w Accompanied|strong="H5973"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w daughters-in-law|strong="H3618"\w*, \w she|strong="H8147"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w she|strong="H8147"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w living|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w set|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* leading \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* said \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H7725"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w daughters-in-law|strong="H3618"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, \w each|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* mother’s \w home|strong="H1004"\w*. \w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w*,\f + \fr 1:8 \ft Forms of the Hebrew chesed are translated here and in most cases throughout the Scriptures as loving devotion; the range of meaning includes love, goodness, kindness, faithfulness, and mercy, as well as loyalty to a covenant.\f* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w shown|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* enable \w each|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w rest|strong="H4496"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* new husband.” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* she \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w aloud|strong="H6963"\w*

\w and|strong="H7725"\w* said, “\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* replied, “\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w home|strong="H7725"\w*, \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w would|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*? \w Are|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w womb|strong="H4578"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w husbands|strong="H5973"\w*?

\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w home|strong="H7725"\w*, \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w too|strong="H1571"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w another|strong="H1571"\w* husband. \w Even|strong="H1571"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* thought \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* husband \w tonight|strong="H3915"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w wait|strong="H7663"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w grow|strong="H1431"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w*? \w Would|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w refrain|strong="H5702"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w having|strong="H1961"\w* husbands? \w No|strong="H1115"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* grieves \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H3966"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* sakes \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.”

\w Again|strong="H5750"\w* \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w aloud|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w Orpah|strong="H6204"\w* \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w mother-in-law|strong="H2545"\w* goodbye, \w but|strong="H5750"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w clung|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H5375"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w*.

“\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*,” said Naomi, “\w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w sister-in-law|strong="H2994"\w* \w has|strong="H2009"\w* \w gone|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H7725"\w* gods; follow \w her|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w home|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* replied: “Do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w urge|strong="H6293"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w or|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w following|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* wherever \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* wherever \w you|strong="H3588"\w* live, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* live; \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* God \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* God.

\w Where|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*. \w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w punish|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ever \w so|strong="H6213"\w* severely, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w anything|strong="H6213"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w separates|strong="H6504"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* Naomi \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* Ruth \w was|strong="H1931"\w* determined \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w stopped|strong="H2308"\w* trying \w to|strong="H1696"\w* persuade \w her|strong="H7200"\w*. The Return to Bethlehem

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* Ruth traveled \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w entered|strong="H5704"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w stirred|strong="H1949"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* women \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* exclaimed, “\w Can|strong="H8147"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*?”

“Do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*,\f + \fr 1:20 \ft Naomi means pleasant.\f*” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* replied. “\w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w Mara|strong="H4755"\w*,\f + \fr 1:20 \ft Mara means bitter.\f* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \f + \fr 1:20 \ft Hebrew Shaddai; also in verse 21\f* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w dealt|strong="H4843"\w* quite \w bitterly|strong="H4843"\w* \w with|strong="H4843"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w*, \w but|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*? \w After|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w testified|strong="H6030"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H7489"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7725"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H7725"\w* \w daughter-in-law|strong="H3618"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w*. \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* arrived \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.
